welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Millburn, a charming and picturesque city known for its beautiful scenery and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in everything it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is the hub for all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with a simple login process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights and is home to airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is currently under construction and is expected to open in 2022. It will serve both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights and is home to airlines such as United and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights and is home to airlines such as Air Canada, Alaska Airlines, and WestJet.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with limited free access. Premium access is available for purchase.
